name: Master Post Advert
author: BBPROJECT.NET

sections.description:
Master Post Advert ia a simple plugin that display advertising between post’s beginning and rest of the content (where the “Read More” tag is).

Available languages

  • english
  • polish (polski)

License

GNU GPL version 2

About

sections.installation:
1. Upload the contents of the file to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Open the plugin configuration page and set up your advertisement
